name: Fatal Furry
description:
Controls

AD - to move player 1 back and forth

W -  to make player 1 jump

S - to make player 1 punch or do a flying kick while in the air for even more damage

Left and right arrow key - to move the player 2 back and forth

Upwards arrow key to make player 2 jump

downwards arrow key - to make player 2 punch or do a flying kick while in the air for even more damage
